name: The Week Off
description:
Enjoy (or not) the life of someone who is no longer burdened by the duties of an employee.

Throughout the week, whether it's Monday, Sunday or any day in-between, you'll have a choice to make. Maybe you want to sleep all day, or maybe you set out on a journey to meet some strange beings from outer space.

It is all up to you!

Let yourself go and choose your own path in this decision-based, text-adventure with over 40 unique titles and endings to unlock!
